RelatedSentence: - The commercial cargo ship Dragon returned to Earth from the International Space Station on Sunday , bringing back nearly 2 tons of science experiments and old equipment for NASA .

A0: the fourth Dragon to bring back space station goods
RelatedSentence: SpaceX 's Dragon splashed into the Pacific , just five hours after leaving the orbiting lab .
Astronaut Steven Swanson , the station commander , released it using the big robot arm as the craft zoomed more than 260 miles above the South Pacific .

Very nice to have a vehicle that can take your science , equipment and maybe someday even humans back to Earth , Swanson told Mission Control .
NASA is paying SpaceX and Virginia - based Orbital Sciences Corp .
Russia , Europe and Japan also make occasional shipments .
